meaningMnemonic: An <kanji>exhibition</kanji> that you <kanji>look at</kanji> and all the people come <kanji>meet</kanji> together. Well, that just sounds like the description of an <vocabulary>exposition</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
